message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XRV_RECEIVED_DATE_FUTURE
message.locale: Certification received date cannot be later than today's date.

message.name: ERR_CASE_FV_CLOSED_ADD_CERTIFICATION
message.locale: The case status is closed. A certification cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_NON_CERT
message.locale: This Product Delivery, is of a Product which is non-certifiable, hence no certifications can be recorded.

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XRV_RECEIVED_DATE_DOB
message.locale: Certification received date cannot be earlier than client's date of birth .

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XRV_FROM_DATE_DOB
message.locale: Certification From date must be after client's date of birth (%1d).

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XRV_FROM_DATE_DOD
message.locale: Certification From date must be before client's date of death (%1d).

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XRV_TO_DATE_DOD
message.locale: Certification To date must be before client's date of death (%1d).

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XRV_CEASEDTRADING
message.locale: %1s had ceased trading before %2d and cannot be certified from that date .

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XRV_LIQUIDATED
message.locale: %1s had been liquidated before %2d and cannot be certified from that date.

message.name: INF_CERTIFICATION_FREQUENCY
message.locale: The period of this certification is different to the certification frequency.

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XRV_DATES_OVERLAP
message.locale: The From and To dates overlap with an existing certification record covering the period from %1d to %2d.

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_DATES_SAME
message.locale: The From and/or To date is the same as for an existing certification record covering the period from %1d to %2d.
